description:
Creative Connections Arts Academy (CCAA) is a learning community where the next generation of thinkers and innovators is cultivated. Students are encouraged to explore and think differently in a family atmosphere at our small, intimate campus setting. The mission of CCAA is to create students who use their creativity to become active parts of the global citizenry.

Students are taught to be self-motivated and lifelong learners through integrated arts and
project-based learning. CCAA has a curriculum that emphasizes positive character traits and
supports the development of the “whole child” academically, socially and emotionally.
